title: CCITC -Join us
description: Join us in this IT revolution. Become a member or a campus ambassador...

forms.title: Member Recruitment Programme
forms.description:
There will be one class per week for any of the above four topics. To attend the classes being a member is mandatory. So here we announce "Member Recruitment Programme 1.0".If you want to be a member, you must fill out an application form. Membership forms are available from today. Contact your section agent for the membership form. A certain number of applicants will be selected as members. Every selected member will get a confirmation message soon (via SMS/mail).
 Current activities include:
1. Programming and Problem Solving
2. IoT and Robotics
3. Web Development and Graphic Design
4. Data Science and Machine Learning

forms.title: Campus Ambassador Programme 2021
forms.description:
We are recruiting Campus Ambassador from all over Bangladesh. Benefits:
1.It would enhance your leadership and communication skills.
2.You will get free access to our online sessions and premium softwares.
3.We would showcase your profile on our website.

Eligibilities:
1.Students from Class 6 to 12 can apply.
2.Should have enough enthusiasm and active participation.
3.Reliable and committed.
 4.Good communication skills.

Responsibilities:
1.Promoting CCITC at the respective institution.
2.Partnership with club/forums of the respective institution.
 3.Help to organize workshop at the respective institution.
4.Encourage students to participate in CCITC events.
